description:
Conversion of existing office building to provide 24 self-contained dwellings, recladding and the erection of a roof extension. (Observations to L.B. Camden). 

 APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  CK: 436: 97/01, 02, 03, 04, 05
decision_conditions:
The London Borough of Camden be advised that this Council objects to the application for the following reason: 

 The size and appearance of the proposed roof extension and alterations to the front and rear elevations would have a serious adverse affect on the adjoining Conservation Area and the setting of surrounding Listed Buildings. 

 Furthermore, if the premises were located within Islington, the application would be refused for the following reason: 

 The proposed development would result in the net loss of office floorspace which is capable of continued use, contrary to Policy E4 of Islington Unitary Development Plan and the Council's Supplementary Planning Guidance 'Conversions from Business to Residential Use' May 1997.
